p: One thousand microliter of cholesterol reagent was measured and thoroughly mixed with 100 μL each of tissue homogenates and serum in separate test tubes. Contents of the test tube (1 mL of cholesterol reagent and 100 μL each of the cholesterol standard and supernatant) labelled as standard was thoroughly mixed and incubated at 25 °C for 10 min. Absorbance of the sample (A sample) and standard (A standard) was then read within 1 h at 500 nm against the reagent blank.
